title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti until al dente.
While pasta cooks, crisp the guanciale in a pan and remove from heat.
Mix egg yolks, grated cheese, and pepper in a bowl.
Toss the hot pasta with the egg mixture and guanciale to emulsify and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for at least 30 minutes.
Simmer the tomato sauce with spices and heavy cream.
Add chicken tikka to the sauce and serve hot with rice or naan.

title: Vegan Lentil Soup

title: Classic Beef Burgers
summary: Juicy homemade beef patties with fresh toppings on a toasted sesame bun.
ingredients: Lettuce, tomato, and cheese for topping
instructions: Gently mix ground beef with Worcestershire sauce, salt, and pepper.
Serve on toasted buns with desired toppings.
